WELCOME: Welcome to {}. To start sending and receiving payments, you need to save the sender or receivers phone number as a contact. Please tell me a phone number that you would like to send money to
WELCOME_REPROMPT: Please tell me a phone number that you would like to send money to.
WELCOME_BACK: Welcome to {}. Would you like to Zelle another contact or send money to existing one?
WELCOME_BACK_REPROMPT: Would you like to Zelle another contact or send money to existing one?
PHONE_NUMBER_CONFIRMED: Okay. What is the name of the contact?
Okay. What should I name this contact?
Okay. By what name should I save this contact?
PHONE_NUMBER_CONFIRMED_REPROMPT: What is the name of the contact?
PHONE_NUMBER_UNCONFIRMED: I couldn't understand the phone number. Can you please repeat it?
PHONE_NUMBER_UNCONFIRMED_REPROMPT: Please repeat the phone number that you wish to send money to.
CONTACT_SAVED: Thanks. I have successfully saved the contact and you can now send payments to it. What would you like to do? Send Money to another contact or to an existing one?
CONTACT_SAVED_REPROMPT: Would you like to send money to another contact or send to an existing one?
CONTACT_NOT_SAVED: Sorry, I couldn't understand the name. Can you please repeat that?
CONTACT_NOT_SAVED_REPROMPT: Please repeat the name of the contact.
SAVE_NEW_CONTACT: Sure. Please tell me the phone number that you want to send money to.
SAVE_NEW_CONTACT_REPROMPT: Please tell me the phone number that you want to send money to.
SEND_TEXT_MESSAGE: Okay. How much would you like to send?
SEND_TEXT_MESSAGE_REPROMPT: How much would you like to send?
MESSAGE_RECEIVED: Who would you like to send this payment to?
MESSAGE_RECEIVED_REPROMPT: Please specify a name from your contact list to send the payment.
ERROR_WITH_MESSAGE: Sorry, I couldn't understand. Can you please repeat it?
ERROR_WITH_MESSAGE_REPROMPT: Can you please repeat how much money to be sent?
OTP_SENT: I've successfully sent the OTP on your registered mobile number. Please speak out the OTP to complete the transaction
OTP_SENT_REPROMPT: Could you Please repeat the OTP?
OTP_CORRECT: I've successfully verified you and I'm completing your transaction
OTP_CORRECT_REPROMPT: I've successfully verified you and I'm completing your transaction.
MESSAGE_SENT: I've successfully completed the transaction. What would you like to do now?
MESSAGE_SENT_REPROMPT: What would you like to do now?
CONTACT_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, I could not find any contact by that name. Please provide a valid contact name.
CONTACT_NOT_FOUND_REPROMPT: Please provide a valid contact name.
MESSAGE_NOT_SENT: Sorry, there was an error while trying to send the payment. Please specify the contact name again to continue.
MESSAGE_NOT_SENT_REPROMPT: Please specify the contact name again to continue.
FALLBACK: Sorry, I didn't understand that. Can you please repeat?
CANCEL_STOP_RESPONSE: Okay. I'll be here if you need me.
ERROR: Sorry, I wasn't able to handle your last request. Could you say that again?
